references/eClassifiers/Link/references/.title: symbolSize
references/eClassifiers/Link/references/.content: Type EDouble Multiplicity 0..2 Symbol size of edge ends. Can be an array with two item to specify two ends, or a string specifies both ends.

references/eClassifiers/Label/references.title: silent
references/eClassifiers/Label/references.content: Type EBooleanObject Multiplicity 0..1 Whether to show label

references/eClassifiers/Label/references.title: offset
references/eClassifiers/Label/references.content: Type EInt Multiplicity 0..2 Whether to move text slightly. For example: [30, 40] means move 30 horizontally and move 40 vertically.

references/eClassifiers/TextStyle/refere.title: fontSize
references/eClassifiers/TextStyle/refere.content: Type EIntegerObject Multiplicity 0..1 Font size

references/eClassifiers/Label/references.title: show
references/eClassifiers/Label/references.content: Type EBooleanObject Multiplicity 0..1 Whether to show label

references/eClassifiers/Tooltip/referenc.content: Type EString Multiplicity 0..1 Extra CSS style for floating layer.

references/eClassifiers/TextStyle/refere.title: borderDashOffset
references/eClassifiers/TextStyle/refere.content: Type EIntegerObject Multiplicity 0..1 To set the line dash offset.

references/eClassifiers/Label/references.content: Type EBooleanObject Multiplicity 0..1 Whether to show label

references/eClassifiers/TextStyle/refere.title: fontStyle
references/eClassifiers/TextStyle/refere.content: Type FontStyle Multiplicity 0..1 Font style

references/eClassifiers/Label/references.title: minMargin
references/eClassifiers/Label/references.content: Type EDoubleObject Multiplicity 0..1 Rotate label, from -90 degree to 90, positive value represents rotate anti-clockwise.

references/eClassifiers/State/references.title: disabled
references/eClassifiers/State/references.content: Type EBooleanObject Multiplicity 0..1 Whether to disable the state.

references/eClassifiers/Link/references/.title: emphasis
references/eClassifiers/Link/references/.content: Type LineState Multiplicity 0..1 Emphasis state of specified node.

references/eClassifiers/Item/references/.content: Type ItemState Multiplicity 0..1 Select state of specified node.

references/eClassifiers/Label/references.title: precision
references/eClassifiers/Label/references.content: Type EDoubleObject Multiplicity 0..1 Rotate label, from -90 degree to 90, positive value represents rotate anti-clockwise.

references/eClassifiers/Label/references.title: rotate
references/eClassifiers/Label/references.content: Type EDoubleObject Multiplicity 0..1 Rotate label, from -90 degree to 90, positive value represents rotate anti-clockwise.

references/eClassifiers/Item/references/.title: emphasis
references/eClassifiers/Item/references/.content: Type ItemState Multiplicity 0..1 Emphasis state of specified node.

references/eClassifiers/Tooltip/referenc.title: valueFormatter
references/eClassifiers/Tooltip/referenc.content: Type EString Multiplicity 0..1 Callback function for formatting the value section in tooltip.

references/eClassifiers/Tooltip/referenc.title: position
references/eClassifiers/Tooltip/referenc.content: Type EString Multiplicity 0..1 The position of the tooltip’s floating layer, which would follow the position of mouse by default.

references/eClassifiers/Link/references/.title: symbol
references/eClassifiers/Link/references/.content: Type EString Multiplicity 0..1 Symbol of edge ends. Can be an array with two item to specify two ends, or a string specifies both ends.

references/eClassifiers/Tooltip/referenc.title: borderColor
references/eClassifiers/Tooltip/referenc.content: Type EString Multiplicity 0..1 The border color of tooltip’s floating layer.

index.html.title: ECharts Graph Model

references/eClassifiers/Tooltip/referenc.title: padding
references/eClassifiers/Tooltip/referenc.content: Type EIntegerObject Multiplicity 0..1 The floating layer of tooltip space around content. The unit is px. Default values for each position are 5. And they can be set to different values with left, right, top, and bottom.

references/eClassifiers/Link/references/.content: Type LineState Multiplicity 0..1 Select state of specified node.

references/eClassifiers/Link/references/.title: ignoreForceLayout
references/eClassifiers/Link/references/.content: Type EBooleanObject Multiplicity 0..1 Prevent this edge from force layout calculating.

references/eClassifiers/TextStyle/refere.title: tag
